info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

parameters.description: Human-readable name for this service instance
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: A URL that will receive event updates when objects are manipulated.
parameters.name: WebhookUrl

parameters.description: `true` or `false` - controls whether this instance fires webhooks when client endpoints connect to Sync Defaults to false.
parameters.name: ReachabilityWebhooksEnabled

parameters.description: `true` or `false` - determines whether token identities must be granted access to Sync objects via the [Permissions API](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/sync/rest/sync-rest-api-permissions) in this Service.
parameters.name: AclEnabled

parameters.description: `true` or `false` - If false, every endpoint disconnection immediately yields a reachability webhook (if enabled). If true, then 'disconnection' webhook events will only be fired after a configurable delay. Intervening reconnections would effectively cancel that webhook. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: ReachabilityDebouncingEnabled

parameters.description: Reachability webhook delay period in milliseconds. Determines the delay after which a Sync identity is declared actually offline, measured from the moment the last running client disconnects. If all endpoints remain offline throughout this delay, then reachability webhooks will be fired (if enabled). A reconnection by any endpoint during this window — from the same identity — means no reachability webhook would be fired. Must be between 1000 and 30000. Defaults to 5000.
parameters.name: ReachabilityDebouncingWindow

parameters.description: `true` or `false` - controls whether this instance fires webhooks when Sync objects are updated through REST. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: WebhooksFromRestEnabled

parameters.description: Human-readable name for this document
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: JSON data to be stored in this document
parameters.name: Data

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this Document in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity.
parameters.name: Ttl

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Permissions applying to a Sync Document.

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Document. Either a SID or a unique name.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

delete.description: Delete a specific Sync Document Permission.

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Document. Either a SID or a unique name.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: Arbitrary string identifier representing a user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.
parameters.name: Identity

get.description: Fetch a specific Sync Document Permission.

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Document. Either a SID or a unique name.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: Arbitrary string identifier representing a user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.
parameters.name: Identity

post.description: Update an identity's access to a specific Sync Document.

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Document. Either a SID or a unique name.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: Arbitrary string identifier representing a human user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can read the Sync Document.
parameters.name: Read

parameters.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can update the Sync Document.
parameters.name: Write

parameters.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can delete the Sync Document.
parameters.name: Manage

parameters.description: Contains an arbitrary JSON object to be stored in this Document. Serialized to string to respect HTTP form input, up to 16KB.
parameters.name: Data

parameters.description: New time-to-live of this Document in seconds. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Human-readable name for this list
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: Alias for collection_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this List in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity.
parameters.name: CollectionTtl

parameters.description: A string; `asc` or `desc`
parameters.name: Order

parameters.description: An integer representing Item index offset (inclusive). If not present, query is performed from the start or end, depending on the Order query parameter.
parameters.name: From

parameters.description: Contains arbitrary user-defined, schema-less data that this List Item stores, represented by a JSON object, up to 16KB.
parameters.name: Data

parameters.description: Alias for item_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. Upon expiry, the list item will be cleaned up at least in a matter of hours, and often within seconds, making this a good tool for garbage management.
parameters.name: ItemTtl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item's parent List in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. This parameter can only be used when the list item's data or ttl is updated in the same request.
parameters.name: CollectionTtl

parameters.description: Contains arbitrary user-defined, schema-less data that this List Item stores, represented by a JSON object, up to 16KB.
parameters.name: Data

parameters.description: Alias for item_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. Upon expiry, the list item will be cleaned up at least in a matter of hours, and often within seconds, making this a good tool for garbage management.
parameters.name: ItemTtl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item's parent List in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. This parameter can only be used when the list item's data or ttl is updated in the same request.
parameters.name: CollectionTtl

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Sync List. Either a SID or a unique name.
parameters.name: ListSid

parameters.description: Arbitrary string identifier representing a human user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can read the Sync List.
parameters.name: Read

parameters.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can create, update and delete Items of the Sync List.
parameters.name: Write

parameters.description: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can delete the Sync List.
parameters.name: Manage

parameters.description: Alias for collection_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this List in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity.
parameters.name: CollectionTtl

parameters.description: Human-readable name for this map
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: Alias for collection_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this Map in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity.
parameters.name: CollectionTtl

parameters.description: A string; asc or desc. Map Items are [ordered lexicographically](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lexicographical_order) by Item key.
parameters.name: Order

parameters.description: The Item key offset (including the specified key). If not present, query is performed from the start or end, depending on the Order query parameter.
parameters.name: From

parameters.description: The unique user-defined key of this Map Item. Up to 320 characters long.
parameters.name: Key

parameters.description: Contains arbitrary user-defined, schema-less data that this Map Item stores, represented by a JSON object, up to 16KB.
parameters.name: Data

parameters.description: Alias for item_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. Upon expiry, the map item will be cleaned up at least in a matter of hours, and often within seconds, making this a good tool for garbage management.
parameters.name: ItemTtl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item's parent Map in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. This parameter can only be used when the map item's data or ttl is updated in the same request.
parameters.name: CollectionTtl

parameters.description: Contains an arbitrary JSON object to be stored in this Map Item. Serialized to string to respect HTTP form input, up to 16KB.
parameters.name: Data

parameters.description: Alias for item_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. Upon expiry, the map item will be cleaned up at least in a matter of hours, and often within seconds, making this a good tool for garbage management.
parameters.name: ItemTtl

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this item's parent Map in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity. This parameter can only be used when the map item's data or ttl is updated in the same request.
parameters.name: CollectionTtl

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Streams in a Service Instance.

parameters.description: Identifier of the Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The unique and addressable name of this Stream. Optional, up to 320 characters long.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: Time-to-live of this Stream in seconds, defaults to no expiration. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Identifier of the Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Stream. Either a SID or a unique name.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Service Instance. Either a SID or 'default'.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: Identifier of the Stream. Either a SID or a unique name.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: New time-to-live of this Stream in seconds. In the range [1, 31 536 000 (1 year)], or 0 for infinity.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: The body of the Stream Message. Arbitrary JSON object, maximum size 4KB.
parameters.name: Data
